short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension uses oauth to pull github notifications and displays them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
### Notifier for github - support oauth

It shows notification numbers in icon in real time. Clicking icon pops up a window showing more info.

The icon is grey offline or unauthorized. The icon lights up when online and authorized.

* Safe: use oauth for signin; no github token is required
* Simple: simple (2 click) oauth flow
